attributes.title: gen z can’t be stopped
attributes.review: how come republicans are more worried about their second amendment being taken away than their freedom of speech? banning tiktok will affect every person not just democrats. no matter what your beliefs are, if you have tiktok, it has been there for you. the people on tiktok are like a family and though we might not always get along and agree, we get each other through the tough times. tiktok has saved lives. it’s helped people deal with depression and anxiety. tiktok has made new friendships possible. it’s opened up opportunities to normal people. it’s helped new businesses and spread awareness for peoples stories. tiktok isn’t just an app it’s a home for anyone and everyone, and with everything that’s happening in the world right now, it’s a place to escape to. gen z and everyone else has lost so much and in the midst of it all we found a home on tiktok so please, don’t take it away because even if you do, it won’t stop us.

attributes.title: i think im blind now
attributes.review: so i downloaded the app recently so i could keep up with 💖mr. orange fanta💖 and news regarding the upcoming election but it seemed that almost immediately weird things started to happen. but before i get into those, the app itself is super unorganized and the fact that i have to look at pictures of him the second i open the app makes me almost want to throw up. i want to keep up with the president's actions, not his looks. anyways, when i started using the app, i would find odd things that would happen daily to my family and i. there were voices whispering homophobic, racist, and sexist comments in all of our ears everytime i opened the app. and to make matters worse, i even discovered orange-filled nudes on the app which made me puke and sent me to the hospital where i am now at under critical condition due to the horrifying images i was exposed to. do not download this app i am begging you. my life will never be the same again.

attributes.title: Disgusting 🤮🤭
attributes.review: As i opened this monstrosity of an app i expected top quality though that's not what i received, as soon as the app opened i was greeted with the most disgusting, most horrifying human, i wasn't able to recognize it but it looked like a bright orange cheez-it, though that's not even the worst part of it all, i was concerned of my safety, it asked for my number, me being a smart teen refuse to have trump knowing my number because then there's a possibility he will come to my house and touch me 🙀✨🤮 so i wasnt able time go in the app, in conclusion this app should be taken down as should trump from office, please and thank you 😊 ✨☀︎🤪

attributes.title: Awful App!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to see Trumps plans and news along those lines. THE APP DID NOT DELIVER! This app is trash. I couldn’t have it open for longer than 3 minutes before it crashed. After it crashed, my phone restarted. Now my screen turns black every time I try to open the app. This has been the worst experience I’ve ever had with an app. Trump let us down! I am also very angry that you need to type your phone number to login. He is tricking you into signing up for his text alerts. I don’t like that he is deceiving us! I would give 0 stars if I could. Trump should do better!! SET AN EXAMPLE AS OUR PRESIDENT!!!!

attributes.title: 🙄✨👏😷Really😷👏✨🙄
attributes.review: This app is officially done when the app was done downloading after 22 months I was done but I was like what ever but when I I first opens the app it hacked my phone and changed all of my contacts to a shrek I was fine with it but when I went back to it there was a death note that said he was going to get the ginger bread man if I did not watch ever single episode of Bill Nye The Science Guy so as I am watching the 256 episode I get a notification that Berry bee was kidnapped by Winnie the Pooh and shrek’s crib and he got help by sandy cheacks but that is not the point but what ever  I would give this app a 0/5 if I could  should not recommend 🤬🤬🤬

attributes.title: ZERO STARS PERIODT
attributes.review: All I wanted to do was support Daddy Trump but he tried to scam me!!!!!!! The app took FOREVER to download, but I could overlook that before everything happened. When I opened the app after that TOO LONG WAIT it turns out it’s RANSOMWARE!!!!!!!!! It took control over all of my apps and information and sent it off to the Chinese Government 😡😡 and the RUSSIAN GOVERNMENT !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! All of my bank accounts are DRY NOW !!!!!!!!!!!! I DIDNT EVEN GET MY APPS AND INFORMATION BACK AFTER PAYING THE REQUIRE SMALL LOAN OF A MILLION DOLLARS FOR THE ACCESS KEY!!!!!!!!!!!!!! THEN IT TOOK CONTROL OVER ALL OF MY DEVICES EVER CONNECTED TO MY PHONE AND ALL OF A SUDDEN MY TV, AIRPODS, COMPUTER, AND ALEXA WERE ALL PLAYING THE NATIONAL ANTHEM!!!!! do NOT download they will hurt you and I WANT TO SPEAK TO YOUR MANAGER TRUMP THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE

attributes.title: MY PHONE BLEW UP
attributes.review: if I could give this app 0 stars I would!!!!! He really tried to make an app for his pedo racist followers! When I opened this app, after it took 6 months to download, my phone started calling me the N word! And I’m not a person of color but I support BLM. The app can read minds!!!! Once it figured out I supported marijuana recreational use, abortion, and funding of planned parenthood, A GUN CAME OUT OF MY PHONE AND IT TRIED TO SHOOT ME! 😡😡😡😡 but the white guy on the other side had no aim! So instead he ended up shooting my phone and the whole thing EXPLODED WITH THE WHITE MAN IN IT!!! this is the worst app and the worst experience I’ve ever had in my whole life!! Would not recommend!

attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD!!!😡
attributes.review: I was on Instagram and I saw an ad for this app and I decided to give it a try because Donald Trump is the kindest most none racist and holy person to ever become president. The app took 30 weeks to download and after I signed up it leaked all of my text messages, calls, personal information, and it replaced all my pictures with videos and pictures of Almonte, Anonymous, and Bill Nye. When I tried to delete the app I was then threatened by the one and only Walter...WALTER!!! I do not recommend this app because it is full of bs, bs, and more bs. This has happened to me and I don't want it to happen to anyone else. 𝓢𝓽𝓪𝔂 𝓼𝓪𝓯𝓮 𝔂𝓪𝓵𝓵✨💕🧚

attributes.title: hives
attributes.review: i’m very upset this app took almost a month to download and my aunt is so angry she started crying doing crack and i don’t know how to feel now like WHAT!!!!!! so don’t download this app it’s a waste of time and your aunt will start crying and doing crack and live in a crack home with the same old friends and nothing else is going on also i’m very disappointed in the display in the app i’m finding it very difficult to navigate around it this app also gave me a virus and wouldn’t let me exit the app until i payed $69 for them to send me oranges🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊and peanuts🥜🥜🥜🥜🥜🥜🥜🥜they were also trying to send me tanning lotion DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP THEY WANNA MAKE YOU FEEL LIKE ORANGE

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: This is a terrible app it took for ever to download. Every time you open up the app it starts to glitch sometimes it will stop but only for a minute or two and then it will glitch again. And when it asked me if I wanted notifications or not I requested no notifications yet I am receiving constant notifications and when I mean constant I mean every five minutes it’s like the app has taken over my phone and is demanding that I pay attention to it. I tried to delete the app but it just started deleting my other apps instead. Under no circumstances should you download this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
